title: 2.46 - उपपाद जन्म के साथ शरीर
arth: [ औपपादिकं ] उपपादजन्म वाले अर्थात्‌ देव और नारकियों के शरीर [ वैक्रियिकम्‌ ] वैक्रियिक होते हैं।
meaning: The transformable (vaikriyika) body originates by birth in special beds – upapādajanma.
vyakhya: उपपाद जन्म से जो शरीर उत्पन्न होता है, वह वैक्रियिक शरीर है।
explanation:
That which is born in special beds (upapāda) is ‘aupapādika’. Thus, the body that takes birth in special bed must be understood to be the transformable (vaikriyika) body.

If the transformable (vaikriyika) body originates in special bed, that body which does not arise from special bed cannot have this attribute of transformableness. This doubt is cleared in the next sūtra.
